title: Has Biden Already Lost It? | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Brad Meltzer | 3/5/21
description:
In light of Dr. Seuss’ cancellation, Glenn reads an excerpt from a "new" Dr. Seuss book about the man who really put Asians in cages … FDR. "The Bachelor" host Chris Harrison admits he’s been meeting with a “race educator." Author Brad Meltzer joins to reveal his newest children’s books, “I Am Frida Kahlo” and “A New Day." Bill O’Reilly talks the week’s biggest stories: Biden’s horrific first six weeks, mental state, and immigration policy; Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s scandals; and the state of local news. Former top-rated Arizona news anchor Kari Lake shares why she is resigning and how disheartening the news industry has become. Comedian Dani Zoldan joins to share why his comedy club, Stand Up NY, is suing Gov. Andrew Cuomo.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
